sentences.english: Breeding and Application of "Ganwanxian 32"a High Yield and Quality Late Indica Rice Variety;
sentences.chinese: “赣晚籼32号”属中迟熟优质晚籼水稻新品种。

sentences.english: Breeding and Application of "Ganwanxian 32"a High Yield and Quality Late Indica Rice Variety;
sentences.chinese: “赣晚籼32号”属中迟熟优质晚籼水稻新品种。

sentences.english: The results of brewing for wine showed that the quality of wine was significantly different among the rice varieties.
sentences.chinese: 酿酒试验的结果表明早籼糯米质与酿造品质密切相关。

sentences.english: Potassium chlorate tolerance is one of the criteria differentiated japonica from indica.
sentences.chinese: 氯酸钾抗性是区分籼粳分化的指标之一。

sentences.english: The milled degree of rice was not strict for wine brewing.
sentences.chinese: 但早籼糯原料米对精白度的要求不高。

sentences.english: Compared with the general rice, the roughness ratio of colored rice were much lower.
sentences.chinese: 无论籼粳稻，色稻品种出糙率比对照品种低。

sentences.english: Genetic analysis demonstrated that the non-pollen sterility in XianS was controlled by a single recessive gene.
sentences.chinese: 遗传分析表明无花型籼S是受单隐形基因控制的。

definition: lilac daphne (Daphne genkwa), used in Chinese herbal medicine
